descriptions:
['DescriptionLuxury Property is delighted to be presenting this fantastic two bedroom home in Armada Tower 3 JLT Cluster P. The apartment has large windows which let in lots of natural light into the apartment and With some unique features and high-quality finishing’s this property is worthy of our most discerning clients.
At 1,199 Sq.Ft the apartment offers a large and versatile living/dining room area. As as you walk towards the bedrooms you will find the guest bathroom to your right and a contemporary open plan kitchen.
The apartment is on a high floor which gives spectacular views of the community and lake it comes with one allocated parking spot, the building has a swimming pool and a gym equipped.
Jumeirah Lakes Towers is built around three lakes and a beautiful park. There is a sense of community within JLT for families, couples and singles made possible by the walking and jogging tracks around the lakes, the community offers play areas for children, basketball courts, restaurants and other retail amenities built in and around the residential buildings that also includes dry cleaners, beauty parlors, supermarkets, shops and restaurants. The restaurants themselves also offer a thriving social and nightlife scene popular with young couples and single expats.']

descriptions:
["DescriptionLuxhabitat is pleased to present this one-bedroom apartment in the prestigious The Address Blvd.
The unit boasts an area size of 830 square feet. This apartment is for those looking for pure elegance and luxury and is finished to the highest standard with a phenomenal view of Burj Khalifa and the fountains. It is fully furnished to a five-star specification and comes with a modern and contemporary living area, a fully fitted kitchen with top-quality appliances and extra powder room for the guest.  
The Address Residences Boulevard Dubai is a five-star premium hotel and serviced residences. Located near The Dubai Mall, it is the sixth addition to The Address Hotels + Resorts portfolio of Emaar Hospitality Group in Dubai.
The residents of Address Residences Boulevard Dubai become part of one of the most happening lifestyle destinations in the city. Further retail and leisure choices include Souk Al Bahar, a modern shopping mall, which draws inspiration from Arabesque architectural elements.
They also have easy access to world-class hospitality and leisure facilities including Armani Hotel Dubai, the world's first Armani Hotel located in Burj Khalifa; Address Downtown Dubai; Address Dubai Mall; The Palace Downtown Dubai; Manzil Hotel and Vida Downtown Dubai."]

descriptions:
['DescriptionExclusive Links Real Estate is pleased to offer you this fully upgraded and unique 2 Bedroom apartment for sale in the aspirational Marina Promenade in the Dubai Marina. The apartment offers 1410 square feet of exceptional living space and presents astonishing views of the Marina on a high floor level.
Shemara Tower – Marina Promenade
2 Bedroom apartment
Fully Upgraded
Spacious Living Room
Fitted Kitchen
En-suite Bedrooms
Built-In Wardrobes
Central A/C
1 Covered Car Parking
Balcony
Marina View
This fully upgraded apartment is extremely well presented with a modern Italian finishing, fully equipped kitchen, en-suite bedrooms and a tastefully upgraded master bathroom and guest bathroom. Marina Promenade is ideally situated opposite to the trendy Jumeirah Beach Residence and residents get to enjoy the dynamic lifestyles that these communities have to offer. This property is also within walking distance to JBR Walk, Tram station and Marina Mall.
The facilities include a fully equipped gymnasium, swimming pools, squash courts, badminton court, fitness centre, library, business lounge, community health club, leisure deck, multipurpose room, barbecue area and among others.
Contact Exclusive Links Real Estate today for your private viewing of this extraordinary property.
Our Team wish to welcome you to our Dubai Marina Shop in Marina Gate 1 on the Dubai Marina Walk.']

['DescriptionThis podium-level, corner 1BR apartment in City Walk, connects directly with the pool and play area! Very few apartments are available on the podium, giving you access to the best in community living right outside your apartment. And even fewer still are corner units!
Connect with me to capture this rare find being offered at the best price. Located in Building 14, that is being represented exclusively by fam Properties, an established authority in this area and named the No. 1 Service Provider for City Walk.
This park-facing boutique building sits directly on the bustling Boulevard leading into City Walk, the premier entertainment, shopping, and dining complex in Dubai. Sustained demand for this project will see your investment grow as you enjoy a premier lifestyle destination brought to you by Meraas, a developer well-known for bringing creative living concepts to life. Watch our overview of City Walk here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2QeHFleijpQ 
Homes designed to exceed expectations:
- Floor-to-ceiling windows
- Generous, open-plan living spaces
- Zanussi built-in kitchen appliances
- Balconies
- Wooden flooring
- Luxury fittings & fixtures
- En-suite bathrooms
- Built-in wardrobes
With the best in city living:
- 24/7 concierge services
- Pool
- Private parking
- Dining options in the building
- Gym
- Parks, play & BBQ areas
- DIRECT CITY WALK ACCESS
City Walk is the thriving mixed-use development in Jumeirah that is directly accessible from SZR. The Dubai Mall and the beach are just minutes away from this superior location in the middle of the city.
As a City Walk specialist, I can show you a number of the best units being offered at the best prices in this project. Call me today to find your dream urban home!
